config/rings/

ring_input.pro


NAME: ring_input PURPOSE: Input translator for planetary rings. CATEGORY: NV/CONFIG CALLING SEQUENCE(only to be called by dat_get_value): result = ring_input(dd, keyword) ARGUMENTS: INPUT: dd: Data descriptor. keyword: String giving the name of the translator quantity. OUTPUT: NONE KEYWORDS: INPUT: key1: Planet descriptor -- required key2: Camera descriptor OUTPUT: status: Zero if valid data is returned ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES: NV_RING_DATA: Sets the directory in which to look for data files. TRANSLATOR KEYWORDS: system: Asks translator to return a single ring descriptor encompassing the entire ring system. If not specified, the translator may return a more detailed set of individual rings. RETURN: Data associated with the requested keyword. STATUS: Complete MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale; 8/2004
